title: Schedule Page Loads with Classes
description: Verify that the schedule page loads correctly and displays class cards for the default day.
steps: Navigate to the home page at /
Wait for the page to fully load
Verify the hero section with logo is visible
Verify day selector buttons are present (Lunes, Martes, etc.)
Verify at least one class card is displayed with class name and time

title: Day Selector Navigation
description: Test that clicking different day buttons updates the displayed classes.
steps: Navigate to the home page at /
Click on the Martes day button
Verify the displayed classes change
Click on the Viernes day button
Verify the displayed classes change again
Verify the active day button is visually highlighted

title: Booking Modal Opens
description: Click the Reservar Cupo button and verify the booking modal opens.
steps: Navigate to the home page at /
Wait for class cards to load
Click the first Reservar Cupo button on a class card
Verify a modal dialog opens
Verify the modal contains name and email input fields
Verify the modal contains a submit button

title: Booking Form Validation
description: Verify the booking form requires name and email fields.
steps: Navigate to the home page at /
Click the first Reservar Cupo button
Try to submit the form without filling any fields
Verify the form shows validation errors or prevents submission
Fill in only the name field
Try to submit again and verify email is still required

title: Successful Booking Submission
description: Submit a valid booking and verify the success message.
steps: Navigate to the home page at /
Click the first Reservar Cupo button
Fill in the name field with Test User
Fill in the email field with test@example.com
Click the submit button
Verify a success confirmation message is displayed

title: Class Card Information Display
description: Verify class cards show all required information.
steps: Navigate to the home page at /
Wait for class cards to load
Verify each card shows a class name
Verify each card shows a time
Verify each card shows an instructor name
Verify each card has a Reservar Cupo button

title: Admin Dashboard Access
description: Verify the admin dashboard loads at /admin route.
steps: Navigate to /admin
Verify the admin dashboard page loads
Verify day sections are visible
Verify class listings appear for at least one day
Verify an Agregar Clase add button is present

title: Hero Section Display
description: Verify the hero section displays logo, tagline, and stats.
steps: Navigate to the home page at /
Verify the Lagunita Health Club logo image is visible
Verify the tagline text Tu bienestar empieza aqui is displayed
Verify the stats show 6 Dias
Verify the stats show 23 Clases
Verify the stats show 8 Disciplinas
